source: TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_000<tab>What brings you to Twine, if you don't mind me asking?
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_000……商人ならともかく、旅人らしきお前が、
この「トゥワイン」に何用だ？

source: TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_010<tab>Though we no longer have that wretched Light constantly glaring down upon us, precious little else has changed around here. Most of us are still living hand-to-mouth no matter how hard we work.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_010空の光が払われ、夜闇が戻ったからといって、
この町の環境が変わるわけではない……。
さて旅人よ、何用だ？

source: TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_020<tab>So much for the return of the night sky! It was good while it lasted, I suppose. At any rate, it's all the same when you're breaking rocks in some mine.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_020空に再び光が戻るとはな……。
まるでこの町の状況をあざ笑うかのようだ。
さて旅人よ、何用だ？

source: TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_030<tab>Is the Light gone for good this time? I bloody well hope so.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_030夜闇が来て、光が戻り、また夜闇が戻るとは、
まるで発展と衰退を繰り返したこの町のようだな。
さて旅人よ、何用だ？
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_A1_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_100<tab>Like most people around here, I'm a miner.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_100俺は鉱山労働者。
旅人のお前には、採掘師と言った方がとおりがいいか。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_101<tab>It's all I know, and to be perfectly honest, there isn't much else <var 1A 02 /var>to<var 1A 01 /var> know in Amh Araeng.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_101なんにせよ、意味するものは同じ。
このあたりの鉱山で、鉱石を掘って暮らす者だ。
環境がどう変わろうと、な。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_200<tab>Not many people are aware of this─even those who live here─but Twine was built through the combined efforts of the Ronso and Mystel. The name of this town comes from the idea of their tails being entwined together.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_200ここは「トゥワイン」。
ロンゾ族とミステル族が、
尻尾を「絡めて」発展してきた鉱業の町だ。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_201<tab>You don't see much cooperation between them these days, though. Most of the Mystel moved to Eulmore years ago and there are only one or two left now.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_201だがそれも、昔の話。
鉱石の需要が減って、ミステル族が逃げ出し、
活気は完全に失われてしまった。

source: TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_202<tab>We Ronso, on the other hand, don't give up so easily. As long as there is work to be done, we'll be here.
target:
TEXT_REGNOR4TWINE_00598_KJARTAN_000_202いまでは、ロンゾ族を中心とした鉱山労働者が、
ほそぼそと人力頼みで採掘を続けているだけ……。
お前のような旅人が望むものは、もうないのだ。
